attributes.action: ALLOW  PEOPLE WITH SKY,VIRGIN MEDIA OR  DIGITAL TO OPT OUT OF RECIEVING BBC CHANNELS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I THINK IN THE DIGIT AGE WE SHOULD BE ABLE TO OPT OUT OF RECIVING BBC. SKY AND VIRGIN HAVE THE ABILITY TO SWICTH OFF BBC CHANNELS FOR PEOPLE WHO DO NOT WISH TO RECIEVE THEM. THIS MEANS NOT HAVING TO PAY FOR SOMETHING THAT PEOPLE DO NOT WANT TO WATCH.

rejection.details: Please rewrite in upper and lower case.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
